  • Traits

Traits#

Traits provide the user with information about the function descriptor constructed using Operators. They are divided into description traits and execution traits.

  • Description Traits
    • generator_of Trait
    • philox_rounds_of Trait
    • sm_of Trait
    • is_rand Trait
    • is_rand_execution Trait
    • is_complete_rand Trait
    • is_complete_rand_execution Trait
  • Execution Traits
    • Thread Execution Traits
      • is_generator_pseudo_random Trait
      • is_generator_sobol Trait
      • is_generator_32bits Trait
      • is_generator_64bits Trait
      • is_generator_philox Trait
      • bitgenerator_result_type Trait
      • offset_type Trait
      • direction_vector_type Trait
      • scrambled_const_type Trait
